Grand_Rapids.Grand Castle (Michigan):
The Grand Castle is a multi-family residential development in Grandville, Michigan with more than 508 apartment units. The Grand Castle's design was inspired by the Neuschwanstein Castle and it has been described "as the second largest castle structure in the world".


== History ==
After years of lower building proposals in the Grand Rapids metropolitan area, proposals and new construction began to increase to some of their highest rates in 2015 and 2016.
